posts.name: Paul Rensing
posts.cooked:
In previous years, WPI had field pictures where some of them were lit/exposed like we would do for finding the retro-reflective tape: dark exposure with a green LED illumination. The collection this year does not appear to have any of those.

Does anyone have a source of some pictures like this? Obviously the real field would be best, but I guess that is not going to happen.

posts.name: Paul Rensing
posts.cooked: Thanks. Note that that file does not appear to be listed in the Resources on FirstInspires. You might want to poke them.

posts.name: Gus Michel II
posts.cooked: TBH, FIRST seems to actively ignore input from teams and the FRC community input except in the few places they initiated it.
